name: Clash of gangs in Miami
description:
Continuing adventures of Carl nicknamed Great Rifleman. After crime adventure in San Diego, decided again roll back to Miami city. Here Carl got in street full of crime and sins. Carl need find much money if he wants to be the criminal king of Miami. Carl again need help of his friend Tony and Tony's gang. But before this need do some dirty job for Tony.

This app includes:
- Crime simulator
- Beautiful America style landscape
- Grab cars on streets with throwing driver out
- Banks and offices robbery
- Race in city and out
- Fights with fists and kick
- Many blows
- Moto, cars, helicopters
- Interesting rap hip hop music
- Fun animations
- Interesting car theft
- Elements of Shooter game
- Elements of Strategy game
- Secret missions with cheat code
